column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Absolutely delicious. This is the best (classy) dinner I've had in Chicago. Though it is dark AF inside
column2: the atmosphere is very old-school cool. A reservation is totally needed
column3: I do believe they offer couches on the main and lower levels that are first-come
column5: but I've never seen these open. Big fan of their corkage fee- you can bring your own bottle of wine
column6: and all they ask is that you share a glass with another table in the restaurant. BAVETTE'S
